name: 4chan Kubo dark
description:
Instead of just copying 4chan minimal dark, I continued to edit david9001'a light theme. This time Kubo wows us with his emotive splatter, used cleverly to represent the characters inner turmoil... I suspect it's just an ink spill inverted.

KUUUUBBOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

THE HEART - http://userstyles.org/styles/21547
